text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
You should be able to see it now. That<n>island is the Mejiro
family's vacation<n>estate.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
The whole island?! All right, that<n>means we get to dig for
treasure<n>anywhere we want!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Don't you even think aboutusing that shovel!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Team Sirius is taking advantage of<n>the summer break to
conduct a<n>training camp.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro McQueen was able to<n>negotiate the use of her
family's<n>private island for us. However...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Woohoo! This island really isdeserted! Now we can play all day!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Come on now, we're not here to play<n>around.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can't say that the environment<n>doesn't lend itself to the
idea, though.
choice_data_list: Why don't we take it easy on our first day here?
Why don't we take it easy on our first day here?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Sigh... I didn't think I would haveyou saying it too.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Hey, is it really okay for us to tag<n>along? It's not like we're
on your<n>team...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I wouldn't sweat it. They did extend<n>the invite, after all.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: The more the merrier. Welcome<n>aboard!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: The more the merrier. Welcome<n>aboard!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Thanks! I'm glad to be aboard!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And thus, Team Sirius's summer<n>training camp begins with
two extra<n>Mejiros.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Okay everyone, one more lap!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Better speed it up, McQueen. I'm<n>gonna overtake you!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hey! I'm supposed to be the pace<n>setter!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Come on, Dober. You can do better<n>than that!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I-I can't seem to concentrate right<n>now. Or maybe I'm just
worried about<n>the way everyone sees me...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
You don't have anything to worry<n>about! You're cute, you
know!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I-I don't need your flattery! I know<n>more than anyone how
unlikable I am!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Gold Ship?! What on earth are you<n>doing?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: What else would I be doing at a<n>beach?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
We came all the way out here, so I'm<n>goin' all out on the
workout!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: All I see you "going all out on" is<n>playing around!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: All right, I'm gonna pick up the pace!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: W-wait! You're going much too fast!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Haha, I may have gone too hard back<n>there. And it's only
the first day!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Still, nice going, McQueen. I'm<n>impressed you were able to
keep<n>pace with Ryan when she sped up.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Well, I couldn't very well let her beat<n>me. Not after what
happened at the<n>Takarazuka Kinen.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Just a little before the camp started,<n>Mejiro McQueen ran in
the<n>Takarazuka Kinen, the final major<n>race of the year's
first half.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She was the favorite to win, but<n>despite her best efforts,
she came<n>second to a soaring Mejiro Ryan.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
But really, McQueen's running never<n>ceases to amaze me!
Both in training<n>and in races!

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Yeeep. And that's why I joined this<n>team!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Urgh... How much longer is this<n>adulation going to continue?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Deep admiration is usually earned.<n>Shouldn't you be proud
of that?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Yep, don't be afraid to strut your<n>stuff. When I hear you
gettin' all those<n>compliments, it puts a smile on my<n>face
too!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
All right, can't let up if I wanna keep<n>beatin' Mejiro
McPopular! I'm going<n>again!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Don't think you've gotten a head<n>start!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Time flies when you're running fast.<n>And before we know
it, the sun begins<n>to set.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Is something wrong? Everyone else<n>has gone inside.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh? Right. I was just thinking about<n>them all, actually.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Not long ago, this team was a shell of<n>its former self, but
now, so many<n>members call it home.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
My own running seems to have<n>inspired many. To think that
they<n>would wish to run alongside me...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You set a fire in their hearts. Kind of<n>like how Oguri Cap
inspired us.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You set a fire in their hearts. Kind of<n>like how Oguri Cap
inspired us.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps... That makes me proud, but<n>also a little
embarrassed. It's a<n>complicated feeling.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
For some, winning the spring Tenno<n>Sho and saving a star
team would be<n>more than enough...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
But for me... it's made me realize I<n>have more that I want to
accomplish.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I want to keep running. To live up to<n>everyone's
expectations by winning<n>even more races.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even more striking than Mejiro<n>McQueen's smile is the
determination<n>gleaming in her eyes.
choice_data_list: Then I'll be expecting great things, McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, and I have no intention of letting<n>you down.
